siccom.sim

Class MassiveCoral

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.portrayal.SimplePortrayal2D
      • siccom.sim.MassiveCoral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable, sim.portrayal.Portrayal, sim.portrayal.Portrayal2D

    public class MassiveCoral
extends sim.portrayal.SimplePortrayal2D
implements sim.engine.Steppable
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MassiveCoral

        public MassiveCoral(Siccom sim,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.awt.Color color,
                    double CI,
                    double maxRadius,
                    double xPos,
                    double yPos,
                    double radius,
                    double growthRate,
                    int age)
        Constructor for massive coral
        Parameters:
        sim - the simulation where coral is situated in
        name - the name of the coral group
        color - the color of the coral group
        maxRadius - the maximum radius a colony can reach
        xPos - x-position
        yPos - y-position
        radius - initial radius
        growthRate - the growth rate of the coral
        age - the time the coral is in the simulation

        Returns:
        Polygon p

      • grow

        public void grow()
        Lets the coral grow. If the branch is not touching another, bigger coral, it will grow with the growth rate defined in the interaction part. Afterwards it calculates the new size and diameter.

      • reduceGeneralGrowth

        public double reduceGeneralGrowth()
        reduces the growth rate of a coral as soon as it touches another coral for each coral it touches
        Returns:
        the new growth rate

      • checkBleaching

        public void checkBleaching()
        Check if the colony will bleach within this time step

        Lets a coral bleach, and die with a certain probability
